title: of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 
of State at the Department of Housing, Local Government and Heritage) (No. 2) 
Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department housing local government heritage) (no 2) order 2025

title: of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 2. Don Kingston, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Don Kingston, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Housing, Local Government and Heritage, is 
appointed as Special Adviser to Christopher O’Sullivan, Minister of State at the 
Department of Housing, Local Government and Heritage with effect from 27 
February 2025. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
 of the Government, 

8 July, 2025. 

MÍCHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 15th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [324] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
